name: DEATH WOUND OCTOBER PACK: VOLUME 1, M. AKERS EP, FLESHEATER AND POSTER
description: Okay.... To raise money for the next zine issue and a few various projects, there's a special package deal. Included is... - DEATH WOUND HORROR ZINE VOLUME 1 - (Out of print, Yersinia Pestis records found a handful of zines that were stowed away....) Interviews with The Templars, Hooded Menace, Brian Yuzna, John Morghen and Tom Sullivan...72 pages pro printed - DEATH WOUND HALLOWEEN ISSUE (back issue, 2012) Halloween issue, backstock copies from 2012 -M. AKERS- UNUSED SCORE FOR ' La Puntura Velenosa Della Notte' EP- PREVIEW: CLICK HERE -CASTLE OF VOMIT - HALLOWEEN DECORATION FLESHEATER Hand silkscreened, three color Halloween decoration by the mighty Josh McAlear / Castle of Vomit. Full color packaging, and fully moveable joints. Cut out by hand. A labor of hatred. ----------------------- All funds are going directly towards the next zine, and a possible reprint of the out of print and out of circulation issues. ---- SHIPS LAST WEEK OF OCTOBER

name: M. Akers - Unused Score for 'La Puntura Velenosa Della Notte '  EP
description: M. AKERS UNUSED SCORE FOR ' La Puntura Velenosa Della Notte' EP PREVIEW: CLICK HERE Little is known about this film, aside from the fact is began production and quickly fell apart. Aside from a few press sheets and a partial script, much of the film has been speculated on and forgotten to history. Taken from a press sheet found in a warehouse in Rome, the tale unfolds as this: "ROME, A CITY OF OVER TWO MILLION PEOPLE. WHAT SECRETS DOES THE CITY HIDE, IN ITS ALLEYWAYS, DISCOTHEQUES AND BEDROOMS? SECRETS, ARE BEST KEPT UNDER LOCK AND KEY...AND LEFT TO THE DARKNESS OF THE NIGHT! NOT ALL SECRETS CAN BE KEPT FOREVER: A DEAD SUPER MODEL, A SALESGIRL AND A PHOTOGRAPHER, WILL SOON BE TRAPPED, CUNNINGLY ENSNARED IN A WEB OF MURDER, SADISM AND LUST. THIS TALE WILL SHOCK YOU TO YOUR LIMITS! DON’T CLOSE YOUR EYES. OR YOU TOO, WILL FEEL . . . “THE VENEMOUS STING OF THE NIGHT!” Found in the same warehouse were pieces of a score for the aforementioned film. Available to listeners for the first time and brilliantly composed in a bone chilling re-imagining of cinema's greatest mystery... ----- Ships out on Saturday, October 5th!

name: DEATH WOUND / CASTLE OF VOMIT FLESH EATER
description:
Hand silkscreened, three color Halloween decoration by the mighty Josh McAlear / Castle of Vomit. Full color packaging, and fully moveable joints. Cut out by hand. A labor of hatred.

--------------------

Will ship out last week of October.

name: *WHOLESALE*: M. Akers - Unused Score for 'La Puntura Velenosa Della Notte '  EP
description:
WHOLESALE WHOLESALE WHOLESALE
-----------------------------------------

M. AKERS

UNUSED SCORE FOR ' La Puntura Velenosa Della Notte' EP
PREVIEW: CLICK HERE

Little is known about this film, aside from the fact is began production and quickly fell apart. Aside from a few press sheets and a partial script, much of the film has been speculated on and forgotten to history. Taken from a press sheet found in a warehouse in Rome, the tale unfolds as this:

"ROME, A CITY OF OVER TWO MILLION PEOPLE. WHAT SECRETS DOES THE CITY HIDE, IN ITS ALLEYWAYS, DISCOTHEQUES AND BEDROOMS? SECRETS, ARE BEST KEPT UNDER LOCK AND KEY...AND LEFT TO THE DARKNESS OF THE NIGHT!

NOT ALL SECRETS CAN BE KEPT FOREVER: A DEAD SUPER MODEL, A SALESGIRL AND A PHOTOGRAPHER, WILL SOON BE TRAPPED, CUNNINGLY ENSNARED IN A WEB OF MURDER, SADISM AND LUST. THIS TALE WILL SHOCK YOU TO YOUR LIMITS!

DON’T CLOSE YOUR EYES. OR YOU TOO, WILL FEEL . . .

“THE VENEMOUS STING OF THE NIGHT!”

Found in the same warehouse were pieces of a score for the aforementioned film. Available to listeners for the first time and brilliantly composed in a bone chilling re-imagining of cinema's greatest mystery...
-----

name: Death Wound - The First Issue POSTER - E.O.H.
description:
Poster by E.O.H., for the first Death Wound issue.

18 x 24, pro printed.

name: Death Wound Horror Zine: Halloween Issue
description: (BACK STOCK, ABOUT TWENTY LEFT...) HALLOWEEN ISSUE 2012: PLEASING FOR THE EYE, HORRIFIC FOR THE SOUL.... HALLOWEEN ISSUE: /Halloween I - W. /Halloween II - Beau Chunks /Halloween III - Sean Neutral Accents /Halloween IV - Evan Occult Obsession /Night of the Demons 2 - JOE HAWK (Lovely Lads, Hammer and the Nails, other bands and he has probably made fun of you at a show before because you look like Morissey but have a Cro Mags shirt) /Dark Night of the Scarecrow - Mike Tommyrot (Tattoo artist and horror movie freak) /Artwork by E.O.H.(does covers for lots of SICK SHIT and other PUTRID DEFILEMENT) and Jamie Jones (Siamese Twins, Confines....chilling ink drawings). /Agony Bag 1.5 SAMHAIN edition by Matt Smith...great zine, for fans of Discharge and not getting discharged for having discharge... DEATH WOUND FLESH EATER DECORATION BY JOSH MCALEAR -- A HALLOWEEN TREAT FOR PRE-ORDERS, AND AVAILABLE FOR A LITTLE BIT MORE OF YOUR HARD EARNED MONEY OR BLOOD..... -------------- Limited run, not to be reprinted. "A SAMHAIN PRAYER...TO AWAKEN THE DEAD...." These are shipping now. IF YOU ORDERED BEFORE OCTOBER 27, YOU GET THE HALLOWEEN DECORATION FOR FREE

name: Death Wound Horror Zine #1  -
description: AFTER TEARING ABOUT MY "OFFICE", FINDING A SMALL STACK OF 15 UNDER A STACK OF POSTERS, AND CONTACTING CONTRIBUTORS WHO I GAVE A STACK TO, I WAS ABLE TO PIECE 20 TOGETHER. 72 pages of cut and paste, pro-printed obsession. Not for the faint of heart, or stomach. FEATURING: Interviews with... The Templars Hooded Menace Brian Yuzna Tom Sullivan (Evil Dead) Johnny Morghen Josh McAlear (www.joshmcalear.com) Writing and research on... Vomit bags Dark Shadows (TV) Music by religious cults The Kennedy Assassination Features on... The Satanic Rites of Dracula Maniac Cop Reviews... Exploitation and horror cinema Lovecraft inspired metal Other stupid stuff... Fiction... Ballistics by Isaac Hale (mind-blowing stuff...) Original artwork by... E.O.H. Josh McAlear __________________________________ Includes: One of three limited edition posters (24x36) Toe tag (Stickers are all gone...will have more for future issues) ---------------- (50 cent price increase has to do with the fact I have lost hundreds of dollars in Paypal fees, and need money for future projects. Thank you for your understanding.)
